snippet: Barnes & Noble is seeking a boost in the highly competitive tablet market after a disappointing holiday season for its Nook devices.
abstract: Barnes & Noble announces that it will outfit its color tablets with Google's application and software store Google Play in effort to strengthen digital offerings of its Nook devices; nation's largest bookstore is seeking lift in highly competitive tablet market after disappointing holiday season; Nook revenue declined to $316 million, from $427 million, in quarter that ended Jan 26.
lead_paragraph: Barnes & Noble is seeking a boost in the highly competitive tablet market after a disappointing holiday season for its Nook devices.

headline.main: After Weak Holiday Sales, Nook Tablets Will Add Google’s App and Media Store
headline.print_headline: After Weak Holiday Sales, Nook Tablets Will Add Google’s App and Media Store
